translations: 腐坏；污染；污点；感染；难闻的气味

sentences.sentence: When much blood had clogged their chariot wheels, I would go up and wash them from sweet wells, even with truths that lie too deep for taint.
sentences.translation: 当大量的血液阻塞了马车的车轮之际，我就要起身，用甘甜的井水刷洗它们，甚至是用深深隐藏在污点后的事实。

sentences.sentence: Rancid oil will taint the flavour.
Boar taint originates from androstenone and skatole.
sentences.translation: 公猪膻味来源于雄烯酮和粪臭素。
